description: Creates an Amazon Redshift Serverless managed VPC endpoint.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: The name of the VPC endpoint. An endpoint name must contain 1-30 characters. Valid characters are A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and hyphen(-). The first character must be a letter. The name can't contain two consecutive hyphens or end with a hyphen.

parameters.name: subnetIds
parameters.description: The unique identifers of subnets from which Amazon Redshift Serverless chooses one to deploy a VPC endpoint. (string) ---

parameters.name: vpcSecurityGroupIds
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of the security group that defines the ports, protocols, and sources for inbound traffic that you are authorizing into your endpoint. (string) ---

parameters.name: workgroupName
parameters.description: The name of the workgroup to associate with the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: The DNS address of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: endpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: endpointCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time that the endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: endpointName
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: endpointStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port number on which Amazon Redshift Serverless accepts incoming connections.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of subnets where Amazon Redshift Serverless choose to deploy the VPC endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: vpcEndpoint
nested_items.description: The connection endpoint for connecting to Amazon Redshift Serverless.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaces
nested_items.description: One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability Zone.

nested_items.name: ipv6Address
nested_items.description: The IPv6 address of the network interface within the subnet.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the network interface.

nested_items.name: privateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IPv4 address of the network interface within the subnet.

nested_items.name: subnetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the subnet.

nested_items.name: vpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The connection endpoint ID for connecting to Amazon Redshift Serverless.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated with.

nested_items.name: vpcSecurityGroups
nested_items.description: The security groups associated with the endpoint.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: vpcSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: workgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup associated with the endpoint.
